description: The Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (DacFx) is a component which provides application lifecycle services for database development and management for Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Azure SQL Databases.
displayName: Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (18.1 DacFx)
